lines.text:
[Wakes up to the smell of cheese]
I know, I'm in heaven.
[Sees Sylvester]
No, I must be in the other place.
Well, I'll tell ya where you're gonna be, unless you do as I tell you, and that's down the hatch.
[Points at mouth]
Oh, please, spare me, Mr. Pussycat! I'll do anything you say.
Okay. But remember, you disobey me, and it's down the hatch.
No! No! Not that! I'll be your slave.
Okay, slave. I've got a job for ya.
Come on, slave. Time to do your stuff.
Just a minute, cat! I've been doing some thinking.
Oh, yeah? And what about, peanut brain?
Well, it looks like you need me to keep your happy home.
Oh, yeah? And what's that make you?
Well, from now on, it makes me the boss around here.
[Plucks out one of Sylvester's whiskers]
Ow! Why you little... I'll...
You'll what?
Why, I'll...

[Jumps into Sylvester's mouth]
Down the hatch? I dare ya. I double dare ya!
[Tries to close Sylvester's mouth]
No, no! Don't, don't! Uh-uh, don't, don't!
Okay, but you'd better keep an eye on me. You just can't afford to have anything happen to me. And away we go!
Marsha, what's going on in here?
Oh, John. We'll have to keep the cat. He just caught a great big mouse, and there might be others around.

[Chuckling]
Or the same one lots of times, sister.
